thread.title: Liverpool need result at Porto to make Anfield edge count - Klopp

title: Liverpool need result at Porto to make Anfield edge count - Klopp
text:
Liverpool need result at Porto to make Anfield edge count - Klopp 7:36am GMT - 01:14 
Liverpool manager Juergen Klopp calls on his side to perform away at Porto to give themselves the chance to make the most of Anfield's atmosphere in the return leg. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
Liverpool manager Juergen Klopp calls on his side to perform away at Porto to give themselves the chance to make the most of Anfield's atmosphere in the return leg. Press CTRL+C (Windows), CMD+C (Mac), or long-press the URL below on your mobile device to copy the code https://reut.rs/2EFGN2Y
